skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bedtime meditation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Bedtime Meditation is the Alexa skill that offers guided sessions to help you relax and drift gently into sleep. With over 10 unique sessions, each lasting 10 minutes, and a variety of soothing voices paired with calming background sounds, this skill is crafted to prepare both your body and mind for a deep, restorative rest.

Unlock Pro Features to enjoy:

• Guided sessions with professional, soothing voices
• A selection of background sounds ideal for relaxation and meditation
• Unlimited access with no restrictions
• Regularly updated programs to enhance relaxation
• Full access to all session lengths

We value your feedback to help us improve and deliver the best sleep and relaxation experience.

Enjoy your journey to peaceful sleep!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
